loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more red oil for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, fish, vita, meat, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en:
Farzana has successfully built her business manufacturing "waan," a thread-like material used to make a bedstead from a wooden frame on four legs, with the support of the Kashf Foundation and Kiva. By this time she has attained regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to her family’s income.  

To meet the demands of her customers, she needs to purchase another good-quality machine, so she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000. It will help her to increase her production and profits alongside. 

She is in her third loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to purchase another good-quality machine for her business

loans.name: Tirza Yaneth

texts.es: Tirza de 25 años de edad  habita en condiciones muy humildes junto con su madre en casa de su propiedad.  Ella es muy trabajadora y dedicada en sus quehaceres. Desde hace mucho tiempo, Tirza trabaja como empleada doméstica y de esa forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Su principal patrimonio es su humilde vivienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo mantiene junto a su madre. Desea mejorar las condiciones de su casa por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para encementar el piso el cual en la actualidad es de tierra. Espera poder contar con dicho apoyo y hacer las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Tirza is 25 years old. She lives in very modest conditions with her mother in a house that she owns. She is very hardworking and dedicated in her daily tasks. 

For a long time, Tirza has worked as a domestic employee; that is how she provides for her household. Her main asset is her humble house, which she and her mother put a lot of effort into maintaining. 

She would like to improve the condition of the house, so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement and sand and to pay for labor to install a cement floor over the dirt floor they currently have. She hopes to receive this support and to make the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand and to pay for manual labor to install a cement floor in her house.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 32 years old, lives in Paynesville, and she has five children between 1 and 12 years old. Only four of them are attending school, and they all live at home. Her husband is a businessman. For the past six years, Annie has been selling crushed rock. She enjoys how she is respected in her family and a mother of a supportive home. One of the problems she faces is that she does not have a good location for her business.

She is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase more crushed rock to resell. Her plans are to expand her business and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more crushed rock to resell.

loans.name: Mukhtar

texts.en:
Ms Mukhtar is  47 years old and married.  She has been doing a business of selling milk for the past 13 years. She has four calves and one cow in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter  that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life.

She has two daughters and two sons, who are in school. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food, and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet day to day expenses of life. 

It’s her second year with the Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through its support. Now she has requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. 

She hopes to have increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: To purchase another cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Concepcion Cayetana

texts.es:
Concepción es un mujer de 43 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con su hijo, ella es muy trabajadora, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Concepción no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Concepción trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, ella vende desayunos y almuerzos a diversos clientes, Concepción trabaja todos los días y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas,ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y dedicación.
Concepción se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que con la ayuda brindada mejorará el techado del puesto que utiliza para sus ventas, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio puesto de ventas.
texts.en:
Concepción is a 43-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Parcona, with her son. She is very hardworking and enthusiastic, and she puts all her effort into providing for her family. Unfortunately, because she lacked economic resources and had to work, Concepción was not able to earn a degree. 

Concepción works for herself in her small business, selling food. She sells breakfasts and lunches to various customers. Concepción works every day; she is able to work approximately 10 hours per day. She feels happy doing her work and believes that it is going well for her because of her good flavors and hard work.

Concepción is very grateful to the Kiva lenders; with the help they provide, she will improve the roof of the stand that she uses for her sales. This will allow her to keep working and striving to achieve her greatest dream of having her own food stand.

loans.use: to make improvements to her food stand.

loans.name: Khursheed

texts.en:
Khursheed is 41 years old and married, the mother of five children. 

The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good-quality milk in her locality. 

With the support of the Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business.  Currently she has requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase another buffalo. 

This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her. She is in her fourth loan cycle with a good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en:
Mumtaz, a 42-year-old mother of three daughters and five sons, has been engaged in hand embroidery for the past five years. Her embroidery patterns are very popular in her territory, and the work provides her family with the basic necessities of life including food, clothes and education. 

In order to meet the growing demand for embroidery, Mumtaz has requested a loan of Rs. 30,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy more frames, needles and threads of various colors. This will enable her to meet customer demand in a timely fashion, thereby helping her to earn more income. Mumtaz hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: To buy more frames, needles and threads of various colors.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Sughran is 40 years old, married, and has children. She has been selling milk and butter for many years. She has 12 calves in milk. She sells to many of her neighbors. Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life.

Sughran is requesting another loan from Kashf Foundation for 35,000 PKR, which she will use to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. Her business improved after her last loan and she is able to manage her day-to-day living expenses. She hopes to increase her production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more income.  She is very motivated to provide her family with a beautiful life, good education, food, and clothing.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and feed for calves.

loans.name: Urania Del Carmen

texts.es: Urania es una mujer de 47 años de edad y reside junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y junto a su compañero de vida trabajan duramente para sacar adelante a sus hijas y llevar el sustento diario. Urania trabaja como costurera en una fábrica de su localidad  desde hace tres años. Para ella lo más importante es que sus hijas cuenten con buenas condiciones habitacionales para lo cual con mucho esfuerzo y con el apoyo de su compañero de vida ha logrado construir su vivienda.  La entrada de su casa es muy vulnerable ya que cuando llueve las aguas lluvias se desbordan por ahí obstaculizando el paso. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y hierro para construir una rampa en la entrada de su casa para evitar algún accidente cuando llueve.
texts.en:
Urania is a 47 year old woman who lives with her life partner and their two daughters. For her, the most important thing is her family and along with her life partner she works hard to let her daughters get ahead and bring in enough for their day to day survival.

Urania has worked as a seamstress in a local factory for the last three years. For her, the most important thing is for her daughters to have good living conditions and in order to provide this she has put in a lot of effort along with her life partner's support to build her house. The entrance to her house is very vulnerable and when it rains, the water floods this area and blocks the passage.

She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, sand, gravel and iron to build a ramp at the entrance of her house to avoid accidents when it rains.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, gravel and iron to build a ramp at the entrance of her house to avoid accidents when it rains.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: María de 37 años de edad es madre soltera de tres hijos de 16 años, 14 años y 6 años de edad. Toda su vida ha trabajado para sacar adelante a su familia y con mucho esfuerzo logra llevar el sustento a su hogar. María se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como: atol de elote, pastelitos de carne, yuca frita, empanadas, etc. De esta forma es como se gana la vida honradamente. Con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de postes de cemento y tela metálica para cerrar la entrada de su casa ya que no cuenta con un cerco perimetral lo cual es inseguro para ella y sus hijos.  María Comenta tener la capacidad de pago para cancelar las cuotas de dicho crédito.
texts.en:
María is 37 years old and the single mother of three children aged 16, 14 and 6. All her life she has worked for her family to get ahead and with a lot of effort she is able to support her home. María sells typical snacks such as corn porridge, meat pies, fried yucca, empanadas, etc. In this way she makes her living honorably. 

With the intention of providing more security for her family, she requests this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement posts and metal sheets to close the entrance to her home as there is no perimeter fence and it is unsafe for her and her children. María comments that she is able to pay off this loan.

loans.use: buying cement posts and metal sheets to build a perimeter fence

loans.name: Yahve Yire Group

texts.es: El grupo “YAHVE YIRE” se encuentra conformada por 07 socias y socios quienes día a día trabajan para mejor la calidad de vida de sus familias. Jhoselyn tiene 22 años es soltera. Dedicada al comercio minorista de abarrotes  que implemento en su vivienda hace más de un año. Y a la vez se dedica al reparto de buffet hace más de 4 años. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite. El grupo agradece a los inversionsitas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Jhoselyn es la se encuentra sentada en medio viste polo negro.
texts.en:
The group "YAHVE YIRE" is made up of 7 members who work every day to improve their families' quality of life.

Jhoselyn, 22, is single. She sells groceries for a living, which she has been doing from her home for over a year. At the same time, she has also been working in buffet service for over 4 years. The loan is to invest in buying rice, sugar and oil.  

The group are grateful to KIVA lenders for the offered loan. In the picture, Jhoselyn is seated in the middle wearing a black top.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and oil

loans.name: Mecha

texts.en:
Mecha, a 73-year-old farmer living in Nyamira, is one of our Juhudi Kilimo clients. He has been farming for the past 20 years. Farming is his source of income. He sells tea, milk, bananas, and other crops. He also has a motor bike which he uses as a mode of transport in the countryside. In farming, he enjoys everything that is involved in crop farming, but his biggest challenge is getting labourers to pick the tea from the farm.
Mecha chose Juhudi Kilimo because they work closely with their farmers to ensure their satisfaction. During the training, he learned how to develop a culture of saving, and, when he gets a loan, how he will repay it with ease. This loan will be of benefit to his family because it will bring in more income and take care of his family's needs.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jose Arturo

texts.es:
Jose es un joven de 19 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con sus padres y hermanos, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar,Jose no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Jose trabaja como técnico de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Jose se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará una moto lineal de segundo uso, la cual utilizará para transportarse a su trabajo y ahorrara en pasajes, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Jose is a young man aged 19. He is single and lives with his parents and siblings in the town of Cañete in the Imperial district. He is very hard-working and enthusiastic, and has a huge desire to get on in life. Unfortunately, because of a lack of economic resources and because he had to find work, Jose did not have the opportunity of studying for a professional career.

On his own initiative, Jose works as a field representative on a farm in his town. He works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes he is doing well at work because of his dedication and effort. Jose is very thankful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he hopes to buy a second-hand motorbike, which he will use to get to work and save on fares. This will mean he can continue working and making an effort to achieve his great dream: studying for a professional career.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Claudia Trinidad

texts.es: Claudia de 28 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos.  Claudia es una mujer emprendedora ya que aprovecha las oportunidades del mercado para poner sus negocios. Desde hace 5 años logró establecer una pequeña pupusería en su lugar de residencia y de esa forma contribuye a la economía del hogar la cual junto con su esposo sostienen. Para ella lo más importante son sus hijos y es por ellos que día a día lucha para llevar el sustento a su hogar y lograr mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir la vivienda junto a su compañero de vida y necesita terminar de hacer algunos arreglos que no ha logrado cubrir. Solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ventanas ya que solo las tiene con balcón (defensas metálicas) y no es muy seguro. Además, desea invertir en la instalación de la luz eléctrica ya que no cuenta con dicho servicio.
texts.en:
Claudia is 28 years old. She lives with her husband and two children in her own home. Claudia is described as a person with an entrepreneurial spirit, because she takes advantage of market opportunities to start businesses. Five years ago, she managed to open a small shop in her home where she sells pupusas [traditional Salvadoran corn tortillas]. She says that this has allowed her to contribute to the household finances, which she and her husband support together. 

Claudia says that her children are more important to her than anything, and she works hard day after day to provide for her family and improve their living conditions. Through much effort, she and her husband have built a house, but they have some jobs to finish that they could not afford initially. Claudia is requesting this loan from Kiva and the field partner to buy windows for her house. She says that she currently has the openings covered only with metal grilles, and that they are not very safe. Claudia also plans to connect her home to electric service, which she currently does not have.

loans.use: to buy windows for her home and to turn on electric service.

loans.name: Jose Castulo

texts.es: José es un hombre de 40 años de edad y reside junto a su tía de 68 años de edad y con su madrina. Desde hace mucho tiempo trabaja como empleado de una librería y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su familia ya que él es quien lleva la mayor parte de la economía del hogar. Habita en condiciones habitacionales muy humildes y con el fin de mejorarlas solicita este crédito a FUSAI ya que desea instalar la energía eléctrica para darle mayor seguridad a su familia quienes por la edad necesitan mayor cuidado. Espera poder contar con este apoyo ya que no cuenta con todo el capital para hacerlo por su cuenta, pero si cuenta con la capacidad para cancelar las cuotas mensuales que dicho crédito implica.
texts.en: José, 40, lives with his 68-year-old aunt and his godmother. He has worked for many years at a bookstore to earn a living and help support his family, and he earns most of the household income. His living conditions are very modest. He has applied to FUSAI for a loan to improve these conditions and install electricity so that his family members, who at their age need more care, are safer. He is counting on the loan because he doesn't have all the money he needs to do the installation, but he is able to meet the monthly payments on the loan.

loans.use: to install electricity.

loans.name: Apolonio

texts.es: Apolonio de 42 años de edad es un hombre que se caracteriza y conocido por su responsabilidad. Para él lo más importante son sus hijos y es por ellos que trabaja duramente para sacarlos adelante y darles mejores condiciones de vida. Habita junto a sus 4 hijos de 14 años, 12 años, 10 años y 7 años de edad en casa de su propiedad. Apolonio es quien mantiene la economía de su hogar.  Trabaja como empleado en la prestación de servicios de seguridad  desde hace un año. Tiene el deseo de mejorar el piso de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar cemento, grava y arena para pavimentar el piso de su casa. Confía que con lo que gana como empleado logrará pagar el crédito que solicita.
texts.en:
Apolonio, 42, is a man who is known for being responsible.  For him, his sons are most important, and it is for them that he works hard in order to provide for them and give them better living conditions.  He lives in his own house with his 4 children aged: 14, 12, 10 and 7.

Apolonio is the one who supports his household.  He has worked as a security guard for a year.  He wants to improve the floor of his house, and so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, gravel, and sand to pave the floor of his house.  He is sure that his earnings from his job will enable him to pay off this loan.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel and sand to pave the floor of his house

loans.name: Yolanda Isabel

texts.es: Yolanda Isabel casada con tres hijos los cuales son la menor aun esta bajo su responsabilidad originaria del municipio de Chinandega, es propietaria de un cafetin ubicado en uno de los centros de salud del municipio donde ofrece: Desayunos, Almuerzos y Refrigerios a trabajadores del mismo centro ha casas comerciales, a comerciantes cercanos entre otros, donde tiene clientes fijos y eventuales, también ofrece mercadería en general como: ropa de niños, adultos, cosméticos, chineria, entre otros, ya son varios años de que tiene estos negocios los cuales le ha permitido darse a conocer por su deliciosas comidas y la buena atención que ella ofrece a sus clientes, sus compras las realiza al contado, ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy responsables, carismática con sus clientes, humilde, sencilla, de esa manera ella brinda un mejor servicio a sus clientes quedando estos satisfechos por el buen trato que se les da. el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en la compra de materia prima como: leña, golosinas, café, pan, sopas, embutidos, aceite, arroz, diversos tipos de frutas, gaseosas, entre otros productos mas. Yolanda agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.-
texts.en:
Yolanda Isabel is married with three children, the youngest whom she is responsible for. She is from the Chinandega district and is the owner of a cafe located in one of the town's health centres where she sells: breakfasts, lunches and refreshments to workers from the centre and nearby salespeople among others. As she has fixed, regular customers, she also sells general merchandise like: clothes for children and adults, cosmetics, low costs knick-knacks, etc. 

She has had these businesses for several years and she has become known for her delicious foods and the good service that she offers to her customers. She makes her sales in cash and she is known for being a very responsible woman, charismatic with her customers, humble and sensible and this is how she offers the best service to her customers who remain satisfied with the good treatment that she gives them.

This loan is to invest in raw materials like firewood, sweets, coffee, bread, soup, sausages, oil, rice, various fruits, soft drinks and other products. Yolanda is very grateful for the support that Kiva lenders offer to people who have few economic resources.

loans.use: to buy consumer products like: bread, pasta, sausages, oil, rice, sugar, fruit, firewood and sweets, etc.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
Angel es un hombre de 23 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Angel no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Angel trabaja como ayudante de construcción en diversas edificaciones de su ciudad,el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Angel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará un triciclo, el cual utilizará con ayuda de su esposa para vender bebidas y refrescos, así pues Angel seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en: Angel, 23, lives in the city of Nazca with his wife and small son. He works hard, is enthusiastic, and strives to provide for his family. Sadly, Angel lacked money to study for a career and had to start working instead. Angel works as a laborer at different local building projects for about 10 hours every day. He believes that things are going well because of his dedication and effort. Angel is very grateful to Kiva lenders, whose funding will let him buy a tricycle, which he and his wife will use to sell beverages so that he can keep working to achieve his great dream of owning a house.

loans.use: to buy a tricycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, cassava, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Urkupiña - 27 Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento URKUPIÑA – 27 está compuesto por ocho integrantes, siete mujeres y un varón, los socios de este banco se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. catalina tiene 50  años  es casada con 3 hijos que son de las edades de 24, 19 y 15años, ella se dedica a la  venta de  chompas en las distintas feria de la ciudad de El Alto, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Catalina va a usar este préstamo para compra de mercadería chompas por mayor,  para su negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital. La Sra. Catalina enfrenta retos en su negocio que son satisfacer las exigencias del cliente y va a utilizar los beneficios en reinvertir en el negocio.
texts.en: The enterprise bank Urkupiña 27 is comprised of 8 members - 7 women and one man. The members of the bank work in various trades. The president of the bank is 50 year old Catalina, who is married with 3 children who are 24, 19, and 15 years old. She works selling sweaters the the different markets in the city of El Alto. This loan is her second with the bank. Catalina will use the loan to buy supplies of sweaters for her business wholesale. She is requesting the loan to increase her capital. Catalina faces challenges in her business, particularly meeting her customers' requirements and she is going to use the profits to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy sweaters wholesale.

loans.name: Jumber

texts.en:
Jumber is a 47-year-old married man. He lives with his wife, two children, and parents in a small village of the Khelvachauri district. 

His parents are provided with a retirement pension. The family runs an agricultural business; specifically, they have two cows. His wife milks the cows every day and produces cheese, which is sold to local retailers. In addition, they have a vineyard and produce wine to sell. 

Jumber is very hard working man, and always has high quality wine. 

He decided to start a stable business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of $5000 for purchasing a minibus. 

As the minibus is purchased, he will work on a minibus line to transport people and increase his family income. The Start Up program will be a great support for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus and transport people.

loans.name: Urias

texts.es:
Urias es un hombre de 38 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Urias no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Urias se dedica a la agricultura, el cuenta con una pequeña parcela donde siembra maíz y plátano,Urias trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación u esfuerzo.
Urias se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de riego, abono y cosecha de su cultivo,así pues Urias seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder ampliar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Urias is a 38 year old single man who lives in the city of Pucallpa.  He is hard working, enthusiastic, and devotes all of his efforts toward moving forward.  Sadly due to the lack of economic resources and the need to work, Urias was unable to study for a professional career.  Through his own initiative, Urias works in agriculture with a small parcel where he raises corn and bananas.  Urias works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes he does well through his dedication and effort.

Urias is very grateful for Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help provided he will be able to cover the costs of irrigation, fertilizer, and harvesting his crops.  In this way, Urias will continue working and striving to achieve his great dream of being able to increase his crops.

loans.use: to maintain his crops.

loans.name: Raul Faraon

texts.es:
Raul es un hombre de 38 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y sus 2 pequeños hijos, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Raul no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Raul se dedica a la agricultura, el tiene una pequeña parcela donde siembra yuca y plátano, Raul trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Raul se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada cubrirá los gastos de riego,abono y cosecha de su cultivo, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser un gran agricultor.
texts.en:
Raul is a 38 year old man, he lives in the Pucallpa city with his wife and two young children. He is very hard working, enthusiastic and puts all of his effort into helping his family move forward. Sadly, due to a lack of financial resources and because he needed to work, Raul was unable to study for a professional career. 

On his own initiative, Raul works in agriculture: he has a small plot of land where he sows yucca and banana. Raul works for around 10 hours every day and he believes that it is going well thanks to his hard work and effort.

Raul is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to their help he will be able to cover the irrigation, fertilisation and harvest costs for his crops. In this way he will be able to continue working and striving towards his dream of becoming a great farmer.

loans.use: to pay for irrigation, fertilisation and harvest expenses for his crops.

loans.name: Cornelius

texts.en:
Cornelius is a Juhudi Kilimo farmer who hails from Eldoret. He has been farming for eight years, rearing dairy cows and growing crops to sell. He enjoys milking his cows on a daily basis, but he faces a challenge of controlling crop and animal pests.

Cornelius chose Juhudi Kilimo to finance him because their dairy loans have an insurance cover for the dairy cows. He also learned that he has to develop a culture of savings in order to succeed. 

He expressed that this loan will enable him purchase another dairy cow; this will mean more income and thus it will lmprove his family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Raghab

texts.en:
Raghab is a 37-year-old differently able person staying in a village of Odisha, India with his parents, wife, and three sons, aged eight years, seven years and five years respectively. He is the only child of his parents. 

As a physically challenged person, he is unable to do hard work, so his father established a grocery shop for him in his village six years ago. His wife helps him to run this business smoothly. From this shop, he earns 4,000 INR per month. He has six years of experience in this general store. He is the only person earning in his family. 

Raghab sells items like bangles, personal care products, toothpaste, toothbrushes, stocks of some essential household items, etc. There are around 150 families living in that village, and they are dependent on his shop for personal care and general household items. But, he is unable to meet the customers’ demand, as his shop is small and has limited stock. 

He wants to enhance his business by stocking up on more of what he sells and add some more goods like detergents, electric bulbs, recharge coupons for mobile phones, etc. in his shop. He has a plan to purchase the goods in bulk amount so that it will reduce his transportation and buying cost. He has requested a loan of 30,000 INR for purchasing a different style of bangles, personal care products, toothpaste, toothbrushes, stocks of some essential household items, etc. 

He wants to save some money for his future and his children’s studies.

loans.use: to purchase a different style of bangles, personal care products, toothpaste, toothbrushes, stocks of some essential household items, etc.

loans.name: Clara

texts.en:
Clara is 26 years old and lives in the West Point area. She’s a single mother with an eight-year-old who lives with her and attends school. 

For the past two years, Clara has been selling fresh fish. During the rainy season, there are fewer sales. What she likes about this business is that it helps her to feed her child and feel proud about sending him to school. 

Clara has requested this loan to purchase more cartons of fish. In the future, she plans to have her own cold storage and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more cartons of fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more vegetable oil, tomatoes, red oil, peppers, mixed vegetables, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Tujikomboe Kitopeni Group

texts.en:
Siwajibu is a married woman with a baby girl who is three months old. Since 2006, she has been running a beauty salon business. Siwajibu works from 6 am to 8 pm each working day, and is able to make a small return each month. 

This will be her first loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania; she will use it to improve her beauty salon by expanding the size of the premises and painting it a nice color. 

With the previous loans (all of which paid back successfully), she bought a business generator to maintain her business service in case the electricity is shut off. Siwajibu managed also to put a new electricity machine, which currently provides electricity for every power user. With the business profit, she  covered part of the home expenses, and reinvested back to the business. She dreams of improving her venture, and opening another successful one.

Siwajibu will share this loan with her loan group, " Tujikomboe Kitopeni", which consist of nine members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to improve her beauty salon by expanding the size of the premises and painting it a nice color.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia de 48 años de edad habita en casa muy humilde pero propia desde hace 21 años.  Reside junto a su hermana cuñado y dos sobrinos. Julia se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora. Ella se dedica a la decoración de calzado desde hace 22 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y ayuda a su familia con la economía del hogar. Con la finalidad de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales desea construir un pequeño cuarto dentro de su propiedad el cual le permita tener mayor privacidad. Ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para hacer lo antes posible el cuarto que tanto desea.
texts.en: 48 year old Julia lives in a very humble house that she has owned for 21 years. She lives with her sister in law and 2 nephews. Julia can be characterized as a very hardworking and enterprising woman. She has been embellishing shoes for 22 years and this is how she earns her living and helps her family with the household expenses. She wants to build a little room behind her property that would give her more privacy and improve her living conditions. She has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy laminated galvanized sheets, wood, and nails to build the room that she wants as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy laminated galvanized sheets, wood, and nails to build a room.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Arca De Noe Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal el Arca de Noé está conformado por diez integrantes, nueve mujeres y  un hombre. Madres y padres responsables  con 12 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte del país. El sauce se caracteriza por ser una zona productora de leche, queso, cuajada. Son personas trabajadoras, luchadoras, que luchan contra todas las adversidades para brindar un mejor  futuro a su familia. 

Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora del banco es  Marcela y tiene por actividad económica una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación. Una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, detergente, jabón, huevos, crema, fósforos. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo  y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El banco comunal El Arca de Noe agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos  recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The communal bank Arca de Noé [Noah's Ark] comprises 10 members, nine women and a man, who are the responsible parents of 12 dependent children. They were born in El Sauce in northern Nicaragua, an area that produces milk, cheese, and curd. These hardworking, striving people fight all odds to offer their families a better future.

Thanks to her efforts and desire to succeed, Marcela, the group's coordinator, has a small grocery store in her house. She offers items like rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, soap, eggs, cream, and matches and spends about 12 hours each day in her store. She will use this loan to stock her store with food items so that she can earn more income. The communal bank El Arca de Noé thanks the Kiva lenders for supporting low-income people in countries like Nicaragua so that they can have decent work.

loans.use: to stock her grocery shop with items such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, soap, eggs, cream, and matches.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila is a 27-year-old married woman. She has been running a business of milk-selling with her husband for many years. She has two buffaloes in milk and sells their milk, along with butter and cheese that she makes from the milk, to many of her neighbors.  She looks after the buffaloes and performs the task of collecting milk from them, while her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis. They are happily doing this together to support their family.

Jamila has two sons and needs to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures, including food, clothing and education. In order to make huge profits, she requested a loan of 30,000 Pakistan Rupees to buy one more buffalo in order to cater to more customers. It will help her to increase her sales and profits alongside.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo.

loans.name: Marysabel

texts.es: La Señorita Marysabel tiene 24 años y es soltera, estudia la carrera  licenciatura en administración de empresas, trabaja para pagar sus estudios administrando el auto de su mama, estudia en una universidad de la ciudad de Cochabamba, este es su primer dentro de la institución, va a usar este préstamo para  distintos gastos  que implica el estudiar como compra de laptop data display y mensualidades para terminar sus estudios, que durara el tiempo 5 años. La Señorita Marysabel enfrenta retos en sus estudios que son el aprendizaje de nuevas tecnologías de la administración, vive en la zona  Alalay Sur, su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es tener éxito en la vida laboral.
texts.en: Marysabel is 24 years old and single. She is studying for her business degree and works to pay for school by managing her mother's taxi. She is studying at a university in the city of Cochabamba. This is her first loan from the institution and she will use it to pay some of her education expenses such as a laptop and monthly fees to finish her studies (which last 5 years). Marysabel faces challenges in her studies, particularly learning new technology. She lives in the Alalay Sur area. Her goal for when she finishes her studies is to be successful in her work life.

loans.use: COMPRA DE LAPTOP DATA DISPLAY Y MENSUALIDADES

loans.name: Koylit

texts.es:
Koylit es una mujer muy trabajadora, con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de comida típica, se animo a tener este negocio porque en la ciudad donde vive, la cual es Pucallpa y se encuentra en la selva, siempre hay visita de turistas y con ello ya lleva 2 años en este negocio; Koylit cree que le va bien porque es muy amable y atenta con sus clientes.

Koylit esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su gran ayuda podrá comprar utensilios y materiales para poder mejorar su trabajo como ollas, platos, cubiertos, asimismo poder mejorar el ambiente de su negocio, así ella podrá atender mejor a sus clientes y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Koylit is a very hard working woman, with a lot of effort she was able to start her business selling local foods. She was motivated to have this business as in her city, Pucallpa, they are in the rainforest so they always have lots of tourists. She has been running the business for 2 years and Koylit believes that it is going well as she is very friendly and attentive to her customers.

Koylit is grateful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to their help she can buy utensils and materials to improve her work, such as pots, plates, cutlery and so own to improve the business aesthetic so she can serve her customers and continue striving for her dream of having her own home.

loans.use: to buy utensils and materials.

loans.name: Pramila

texts.en:
Pramila is very happy to receive her first loan from Kiva, which she will use to invest in her potato cultivation business by buying the necessary supplies like potato seeds, fertilizers, urea and more. Pramila is 46 years old and lives in the small town of Dhupguri with her husband Upen and two children. Her children go to school. 

Enterprising and knowledgeable, Pramila decided to plant potatoes because potatoes are a year round crop and a very popular vegetable. She can earn more profit through this. 

She hopes to have a good harvest and to earn profits to achieve her dreams and goals of continuing to expand her vegetables. Her plan is to improve her financial condition and provide her children a good lifestyle with a good education.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds, fertilizers, urea and more to cultivate potatoes.

loans.name: Alma Yecenia

texts.es: Alma de 38 años de edad es divorciada y es responsable de su hija de 16 años y su hijo de 4 años de edad. Para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos tengan mejores condiciones de vida a las que ella ha tenido acceso y es por ellos que trabaja duramente para llevar el  sustento diario a su  hogar. Alma se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde  hace mucho tiempo y con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a su familia desea reparar el techo del baño de su casa el cual con el tiempo se ha dañado y es necesario cambiarlo. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y pago de mano de obra para hacer el cambio de la cubierta del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Alma, 38, is divorced and responsible for her 16 year old daughter and 4 year old son. The most important thing for her is that he children have the best quality of life she can offer and she works hard to bring the necessary income into their home. 

Alma has worked as a maid for a long time and in order to offer better security to her family she wants to repair the rood of the bathroom as it has become damaged with age and needs replacing. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI so she can spend it on buying corrugated metal sheets and wood and to pay for labourers in order to replace the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheets and wood and to pay for labourers to replace the roof on the bathroom.

loans.name: Mtazamo Group

texts.en:
Sara, who is in her early 30s, is married with two children. One of her children goes to school and the other one is still small. She has been running a beauty salon since 2010.  She works from 8 am to 9 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Sara's fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used her previous loans to buy a steaming machine and more salon equipment and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She used the profit to buy a TV set and a radio and pay household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy more salon equipment, especially the items in high demand.  She dreams of having an international salon.  

Sara will share this loan with her loan group Mtazamo, which has six members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more salon equipment

loans.name: Kubaho Cb Group

texts.en:
Stephanie is 71 years old. She is married with eight children; most of them got married and take care of their households. 

Stephanie is a group leader of Kubaho meaning “To Live” in English. Group members have different business that they run, but they share the common belief of uplifting their standards of living. 

With the loan, Stephanie would like to buy more bananas to sell. 

The profits from the business will be used to make savings. Stephanie is in the back of the photo with her hand raised.

loans.use: To buy more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Meline

texts.en:
Meline lives in Sevqar village with her parents and brother. Her mother is a teacher with many years of experience teaching at a local school, and her father works at the same school as a keeper. 

Meline studies at Yerevan State University of Ijevan town. Her parents work hard to sustain the family's living, and it is very difficult for them to save money for Meline's education. So, by applying for this loan, Meline asks for financial support to be able to pay for her university tuition and continue her education. 

The loan is very important for Meline, and she waits for your support.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Rwere Tukore Group

texts.en:
Winnie is a mature woman, aged 41 years. She is married with six children. She lives in a remote area in Buyanja – Rukungiri District. She is involved in cattle fattening and dairy farming. With her business she has managed, together with the husband, to provide for her family the basic needs and good education.

She has secured a loan of UGX 1,000,000 to use in clearing her farm, which will in turn improve on the pastures. She expects to yield more milk and more income from her animals after getting good pastures. She supplements her cattle business with income from sales from a banana plantation and milk.

She has high hopes to grow her farm bigger and earn more to sustain her family.

loans.use: to hire labour to clear her farm.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa, 48, is a widow with two children and lives at West Point. Hawa has been managing her business for the past 15 years in order to sustain herself. Her children are between the ages of 20 and 28, and are independent; only one of them is currently in school. 

Hawa has a table in the market where she sells lappers (a traditional country cloth). Because of the quality lappers that she sells, she makes a profit every day. With the profit she buys more goods and improves her life. 

She is requesting her fifth loan from BRAC Liberia to purchase more lappa for the business. Her plan is to become an international business woman.

loans.use: to purchase more lappa for the business.

loans.name: Blanca Mirian

texts.es: Blanca de 34 años de edad habita junto  a su esposo y sus 4 hijos de 11 años, 13 años, 14 años y 15 años de edad. Blanca es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora quien junto a su esposo llevan la economía de su hogar. Ella y su esposo trabajan en una carpintería cerca de su localidad y así es como llevan el sustento diario. Su principal patrimonio es su humilde vivienda la cual todavía necesita algunas mejoras. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, grava y arena para encementar el piso ya que en la actualidad es de tierra. Además, desea hacer la instalación de la energía eléctrica ya que no cuenta con el servicio. Espera poder contar con dicho apoyo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Blanca is 34 years old and lives together with her husband and her four children who are 11, 13, 14, and 15 years old.  Blanca is a very hard working woman and entrepreneur who together with her husband carries the economy of their home.  She and her husband work in a nearby carpentry shop - this is how they earn their daily living.  

Her primary asset is her humble home which still needs some improvements.  In order to improve their living conditions she seeks this FUSAI loan to invest in the purchase of cement, gravel, and sand to cement the floor which is presently earthen.  Also, she hopes to install electricity since she does not have this service.  She hopes to rely on such support as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cement, gravel, and sand to cement the floor and install electricity.

loans.name: Irma Aracely

texts.es: Irma de 32 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y sus tres hijos. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que con mucho esfuerzo junto a su esposo ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos.  Irma se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y además pertenece a un programa del gobierno en el cual le enseñan un oficio y le remuneran por el tiempo que está en dicho programa. Con los ingresos que recibe logra colaborar con la economía de su hogar y darle a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Su deseo es construir una pequeña cocina ya que como se puede apreciar en la fotografía la tiene al aire libre y no es muy higiénico ni seguro.  Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra para dicha construcción y así dar mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en: 32 year old Irma lives lives in her own house along with her husband and 3 children. She is an enterprising woman who, with much effort, and along with her husband, has managed to raise her children. Irma works offering domestic services and also belongs to a government program in which they teach people a trade and pay them for their time in the program. The income that she receives enables her to contribute to the household economy and give her kids better living conditions. She wants to build a small kitchen because (as you can appreciate from the photo) hers is in the open air and isn't very hygienic or secure. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying bricks, cement, sand, and iron, and to pay for laborers to do the construction. In this way, she will give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron, and to pay laborers to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Carmelina

texts.es: Carmelina de 30 años de edad es divorciada y reside en casa propia junto a sus padres quienes ya son ancianos y dependen de ella económicamente.  Carmelina trabaja como empleada doméstica y es así como mantiene la economía de su casa.  Desde hace algunos años logro construir una pequeña casa  pero no ha logrado terminarla ya que le hacen falta unos detalles tales como: el corredor, puertas y ventanas. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, una puerta y una ventana. Espera contar con este apoyo ya que desea mudarse a su nueva casa lo antes posible.
texts.en: 30 year old Carmelina is divorced and lives in her own home along with her parents who are elderly and economically dependent on her. Carmelina works as a domestic employee and this is how she maintains the household economy. Some years ago she was able to build a small house but she has not finished it as it is lacking some finishing details such as: the corridor, doors, and windows. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying laminated galvanized sheets, a door, and a window. She hopes to receive this support as she wants to move into her new home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminated sheets, a door, and a window.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more milk, rice, vegetable oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar is married and has two children.  She is from Yerevan. Gohar runs a small store in a city market where she sells different types of clothing. Gohar's son studies at European College in Armenia and is currently in his second year of study. Gohar and her husband work hard to sustain their family and ensure all necessary living conditions for their children. 

Because of current financial hardships that Gohar and her family face, she is not able to save money for Hayk's education in college. She is requesting a loan, which she will use to pay for college tuition of her son.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more peppers, onions, bitter ball, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Jyotsna

texts.en: Jyotsna is 43 years old and her husband is 54 years old. Jyotsna has passed class V (grade 5) & her husband is illiterate, just knowing how to sign his name. Jyotsna has two children, neither of whom received an education. Her husband sells bed nets door to door, but this does not help their family enough. Jyotsna wants to shift to another business, but to start a new business she needs capital. Jyotsna learned sewing in her childhood. From the beginning, she has tried to use her skills and do something on her own so that she can help her family. Then she heard about BJS and applied for a loan of INR 8,000 to buy a sewing machine so that she can make clothing to sell at the market. Her dream is to establish her business, become settled in her life, to support her family and to give a proper education to her children.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine for her tailoring business

loans.name: Nurma

texts.en: Nurma is a 22-year-old married woman with two children, one of whom receives an education and the other is too young for school. Nurma is a housewife while her husband is a farmer. They live in the small town of Dhupguri. From the very beginning, they have struggled a lot because their earnings were not enough. They could not afford to buy a variety of different seeds and pay labor costs. She is taking this loan to purchase potato seeds and to pay for laborers. They hope that from this loan, there will be great profits. They are thankful to BJS and Kiva for helping them.

loans.use: To buy seeds and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Evelin

texts.es: La Sra. Evelin  tiene 21 años y es casada con un hijo de  6 meses,  ella se dedica a la venta de comida, en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona de San Jorge,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  La Sra. Evelin  va a usar este préstamo para compra de una heladera para su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es necesidad de ampliar  y satisfacer a sus clientes.  La Sra.  Evelin  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son incrementar su clientela y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia, el deseo para su negocio es poder tener un restaurante grande y así brindar la comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Evelin, age 21, is married and has a six month old child.  She sells food at her stand in the San Jorge area.

This loan is her first sequence within the institution.  Evelin will use the loan to buy a refrigerator for her business.  The reason she is requesting this loan is out of the need to expand and to satisfy her customers.

Evelin faces the challenge in her business of increasing her clientele.  She will use the profits to improve her family’s quality of life.  Her wish for her business is to be able to have a large restaurant.  This way she will make her customers comfortable.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Manuel Armando

texts.es:
Manuel, se le presenta la necesidad de invertir de nuevo en su negocio de viajes exprés, comprara llantas, repuestos y aceite, para mejorar el servicio que da a sus clientes, con la inversión anterior el mejoro su medio de transporte y brindo un servicio de calidad.
Su economía ha mejorado, cancelo sus deudas y su familia muy saludable siempre brindándole  el apoyo que el necesita para salir adelante.
texts.en: Manuel needs to invest in his express trips business again.  He will buy tires, replacement parts, and oil in order to improve the service that he gives his customers.  With the previous investment he improved his means of transportation and provided quality service.  His finances have improved, he paid his debts, and his family is very healthy.  They always give him the support he needs in order to get ahead.

loans.use: to pay for replacement parts, oil, and tires for his moto taxi.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a 50-year-old farmer living in Eldoret. She is married and has six children.

She has been farming for the past 22 years, breeding poultry, pigs, and dairy cows; she also grows crops. She loves farming very much, and the most interesting part in farming is selling the farm outputs, while her biggest challenge is getting a ready market for her farm produce.

Esther chose Juhudi Kilimo because they deal with small scale farmers to help them better their lives. She learned that once she takes a loan for a particular project, she should never divert the money to a different use.

This loan will be used to add more pigs for selling, and the income will be used to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase pigs

loans.name: Parul

texts.en: Parul, a 52-year-old married woman, lives in Dhupguri, a small town of West Bengal in India. Her husband, Bhupen, is a farmer. Parul is a hardworking homemaker and has a basic education. They have their own land where her husband cultivates different vegetables and crops in different seasons and supplies those items to the wholesale market. Parul helps her husband in the field. She wants to take a loan from BJS to buy potato seeds and fertilizer for their land. Her plan is to improve her life style and to prosper in her life.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds and fertilizer .

loans.name: Tanneh

texts.en:
Tanneh is 34 years old and a mother.  They live in the town of West Point; her children range in age between 4 months and 11 years. 

She’s engaged in selling charcoal, which she buys in the rural area and sells in the local market in her community.

Tanneh has requested a loan to purchase more charcoal, and hopes to make more profit to enable her give her children a quality education.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal.

loans.name: Glaydys K.

texts.en: Glaydys lives in West Point, which has one of the most populated and well-known market areas in Montserrado County. She is 28 years old and she lives with her boyfriend and their two children aged 8 months and 5 years old. Only the oldest one is in school. For two years, she has been selling slippers in her community market. One of her challenges is the reduced income because of her low inventory. She enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profits she generates every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more slippers for her business. Her dream is to have a house of her own.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers for her business.

loans.name: Jestina

texts.en:
Jestina is 29 and lives in Paynesville; she and her boyfriend, who is a college student, have four children, ages 3 months, 6, 9, and 11. Three of her children are currently in school and they all live at home. 

Since 2002, she has been cooking and selling rice and soup in the local market; she make a lot of profit, and has many customers.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, fish, palm oil, meat, etc. for her business.

Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, fish, palm oil, meat, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Genik

texts.en:
Genik is from Brnakot village of Syunik region. He lives with his two daughters and wife. Genik's elder daughter Susanna is 19 years old and studies at Yerevan State University. Genik works hard in order to sustain his family's living and at the same time pay for his daughter's education costs. 

Because of current financial hardships, Genik is currently doesn't able to pay for Susanna's university tuition. By applying for this loan Genik asks for financial support. It is very important for Genik to give Susanna an opportunity to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Lilit

texts.en:
Lilit lives in Yerevan with her parents. She studies at the European Academy in Armenia and specializes in economics. Lilit's parents work hard to gather income and sustain the family. As it is very difficult for the family to save money for Lilit's education, she has applied for this loan. The loan will help her to pay for university tuition and continue her studying. 

Lilit waits for lenders' support, because education is very important for her.

loans.use: to pay for university tution

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is 26-year-old married woman. She lives in the district of Vani with her husband, an infant son and grandmother. Her grandmother is provided with a retirement pension, which is the only source of income for the family. 

Nino decided to start her own business and requested a credit. The Start Up Program, which is a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of $1,500 for purchasing clothes. She already owns a commercial space, where she is going to open a clothes shop. With the received credit she will purchase clothes and will open the shop. The new business initiative will be a great support for the family.

loans.use: to open a clothes shop

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa is thirty six years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is single and has three children ages 8, 10, and 16. Although she is a elementary school dropout who only completed grade one, she runs her Irish potatoes business in the local market very well in order to realize some money for her expense.

Hawa has requested a loan to purchase more Irish potatoes. She hopes her local business can one day be an international one, and she hopes to have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase more Irish potatoes.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en: Sharon is 36 years old and lives in Paynesville South – one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married and her husband is a farmer. They have two children, ages 17 and 19, who are currently in school and live at home. For the past four years, Sharon has been selling coal in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has many customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more coal bags for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more coal bags for her business.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Ms. Shahida is a 47-year-old married woman who has been in the business of selling milk for the past two years. She has two calves and two milk buffaloes. She sells the milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to allow her to lead a decent life.

She has two children, one of whom goes to school. She is very motivated to provide her children a beautiful life with good education, food, and clothing.  She has grown her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of her life.

This is her third year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business with the foundation's support. Now she is requesting a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase one more cow and feed for the calves. She hopes to increase in her production capacity which will ultimately help generate more cash.

loans.use: to purchase another cow and feed for calves.

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en:
Kumba is 33 years old and lives in Paynesville. She is married and her husband is an NGO worker and they have 3 children aged between 12 and 16 who are currently in school and live at home.

For the past year, she has been selling door locks, hinges, nails, etc. in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has many customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more door locks, hinges, nails, etc. for her business. 

Her future plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more door locks, hinges, nails, etc. for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her purchase more video cassette for resale

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: La Sra. Lucy tiene 25 años, ella se dedica  a  la elaboración y venta de quesos, ella vive en la localidad de Cullucachi, este préstamo es primero que tiene con la institución, la Sra. Lucy va a usar este préstamo para compra de un ganado lechero mejorado para tener una mejor producción de leche,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es mejorar sus ingresos, La Sra. Lucy enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su negocio y calidad de vida, la Sra. Lucy va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar sus ingresos, la Sra. Lucy desea para su negocio crecer en la producción y venta de leche, Ella es una joven trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de seguir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lucy is 25-years-old and works at processing and the sale of cheese. She lives in the town of Cullucachi. This is the first loan that she has with the institution. Lucy will use this loan to purchase dairy cattle at a higher quality so that she can improve her milk production.
 
She is applying for this loan to improve her income. Lucy faces many challenges such as improving her business and quality of life. Lucy is going to use her earnings to improve her revenue. Lucy wishes her business would grow in production and milk sales. She is a young hard worker and entrepreneur who wants to move ahead and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase higher quality dairy cattle.

loans.name: Mattia

texts.en:
Mattia lives in Paynesville and she is 35 years old. She is married to a local businessman and they have three children aged between 12 and 21 years old, who are in school and live at home. 

For the past three years, she has been selling used clothes in the local market. She says she is proud of her business because of the money she receives daily, and it was her husband who give her money to start this business. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes to expand her business. In the future, she wants to buy a piece of land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes to expand her business

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 37 years old and lives in Paynesville, Liberia. She is married and her husband is a farmer. Together they have five children between one and seventeen years old. Only four of them are currently in school and they all live at home.

For the past 12 years, Jacqueline has been selling coal in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has gained more customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more bags of coal for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of coal for her business.

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en:
Kumba lives in Paynesville and she is 48 years old. She is married with three children aged between 8 and 28 years old and only two are currently in school and live at home. 

For the past four years, she has sold palm oil in the market. She started this business with a little amount of money received from her husband. She enjoys serving her customers and the that she generate from her business. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil to increase her sales and she plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil to increase her sales,

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Ms. Razia is a 31-year-old lady and enjoys doing the work of hand embroidery. She started doing this work two years ago, and her embroidery patterns are very popular in her territory. She makes enough to contribute in the family income. She has one daughter and two sons. She is motivated to provide her family with the basic necessities of life including food, clothes and education. 

In order to meet the growing demand for embroidery, she needs to buy more frames, needles and threads of different colors. For this reason she has requested a loan of PKR 30,000 from Kashf foundation. With this assistance, she can manage the demands of her customers in a timely manner, which will help in generating more income. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: To buy more frames, needles and threads of different colors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cassava, plantain, fish, meat etc to improve her overall sales

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour and other baking ingredients, thus allowing her to meet rising customers’ demands.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy chicken, flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is a 51-year-old married woman. She lives in a small village of Telavi district with her husband and son. Her husband works at the car workshop and gets a small monthly salary. Nino is a tailor and gets orders. 

As her income is not stable, she decided to start a family business. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of $5,000 to open a grocery store. With the received credit, she will purchase a stock of groceries. The Start Up program will be a great support for the family.

loans.use: to open a grocery store and a buy a stock of groceries.

loans.name: Amie

texts.en:
Amie is 35 years old and lives in Paynesville. She is married and her husband is a builder and they have 2 children, aged 17 and 20, who are currently in school and live at home. 

For the past 15 years, she has been selling lappa (fabric) and milk in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has many customers as her business is in a very good location. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more lappa (fabric) and milk for her busines and her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more lappa (fabric) and milk for her business

loans.name: Aziz

texts.en:
Aziz is a 33-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling milk with her husband for many years. She has two buffaloes in milk, and she sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. She looks after the buffaloes and performs the task of collecting milk from them while her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis. They are happily working together to support their family.

Aziz is a mother of four children and needs to earn more to meet the family's everyday expenditures, including food, clothing and education. In order to make huge profits, she has requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers. She hopes to increase production capacity which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo.

loans.name: Watta

texts.en:
Watta is 30 years old and lives in Paynesville. She is married and her husband is a businessman. They have four children agesd four, nine, eleven, and eighteen and they are all presently in school and live at home. 

For the past three years, she has been selling cassava in the local market and she normally makes a lot of profit but her major problem is that she has low inventory. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase cassava for her business and she hopes to be a big businesswoman in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cassava for her business

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en:
Fatu lives in West Point with her husband, who is a mechanic. She is 47 years old and has four children, between the ages of 2 and 28. Two of her children stay with her at home and are attending school, while the other two are grown up and are independent. 

She has been selling rice, peppers, onions, vita, cooking oil and palm oil in the community market for the past eight years. She learned to sell from her aunt and she started this business with a little income that she received from her husband. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more vita, cooking oil, peppers, and rice to increase her sales. Her plan for the future is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more vita, cooking oil, peppers and rice to increase her sales.

loans.name: Evelia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Evelia de 50 años de edad, casada con dos hijos menores de edad. Originaria de  Leon, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación  personal, en sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos y pasar tiempo de calidad. Desde muy joven se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.

Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de cosméticos como rubor, base, delineador, sombras de ojos, lápiz de ojos, lápiz labiales, desmaquilladoras, cremas hidratantes, anteojeras, perfumes. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 10 horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. EL negocio lo tiene ubicado de forma ambulante y en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital y surtir su negocio de cosméticos, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Evelia agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan  a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno
texts.en:
Evelia is 50 years old and married with two children of young age.  She is originally from Leon, a place that is located in the western region of the country.  She is known to be hard working, responsible, and has hopes of personal improvement.  In her free time she enjoys the company of her children and spending quality time with them.  From the time she was very young she was obligated to work to help with the household expenses.

Thanks to her efforts and her hopes of getting ahead she has for her economic activity the sale of cosmetics like blush, base, eye liner, eye shadow, eye pencils, lipstick, makeup remover, moisturizer, eye cream and perfume.  She devotes 10 hours daily to her business offering her products.  The business is as a street vendor or she sells in her own home..  

The goal of this loan is to invest in capital and to stock her business with cosmetics so that in the near future she can earn better income.  Evelia appreciates the help that Kiva investors offer for people of scarce resources and poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock for her business in the purchase and sale of cosmetics such as blush, base, eye liner, eye shadow, eye pencils, lipstick, makeup remover, moisturizer, eye cream, and perfume.

loans.name: Aidah

texts.en:
Aidah is a single mother of one child who goes to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. 

She has a business selling used clothes and has been in this business for five years. She works at the market six days in every week and sells on a retail basis. She has applied for a loan of 600,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. She generates additional income through selling used shoes. Her major business challenges include seasonality and law enforcement officers. 

She aspires to become a wholesaler and also to obtain enough profit so as to buy a plot of land and build her own house. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but no piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes

loans.name: Farida

texts.en:
Farida is married with three children; two of her children go to school. She also takes care of additional family members (mother). She has a business of selling sugar canes and has been in this business for 6 years. She has applied for a loan of 700,000 Uganda Shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bundles of sugar canes. She generates additional income through selling tomatoes. 

She works at the market seven days out of every week, and sells on retail basis only. Her major business challenges includes thieves and seasonality. She is aspiring of buying a piece of land to start growing sugar canes. She resides in a rented house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy bundles of sugar canes.

loans.name: Berta Lucía

texts.es: Berta hace 2 años aproximadamente decidió iniciar su propio negocio con el fin de apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar, montó un taller de confección en un pequeño espacio de su vivienda, trabaja de lunes a sábado de 8:00 am a 6:00 pm y cuenta con el apoyo de su hija mayor; esta actividad la aprendió por medio de algunas amigas y gracias a cursos de capacitación que la alcaldía del municipio desarrolló, pudo complementar sus conocimientos y mejorar las técnicas, lo que le ha permitido darse a conocer en el sector y adquirir contratos con buenas empresas a las cuales les confecciona uniformes. Su carisma, empuje y dedicación le han permitido salir adelante y ha encontrado en créditos anteriores el apoyo para fortalecer su negocio poco a poco, es por ello que solicita su sexto ciclo crediticio, pues requiere adecuar el espacio de trabajo (pintura y ampliación) y, hacer mantenimiento de los motores de sus máquinas de confección; esto le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de trabajo y podrá tener más espacio para agilizar la producción de fin de año, pues la demanda del servicio aumenta, además podrá cumplir con las entregas de manera oportuna y con prendas de excelente terminación y calidad, generando así mejores ingresos para su hogar y, abriéndose paso para adquirir nuevos contratos. Berta desea seguir trabajando arduamente para sacar adelante su actividad generadora de ingresos, pues sueña con poder adquirir un taller de confección mucho más amplio, que le permita crecer y brindar oportunidades de trabajo, especialmente a madres cabeza de hogar; así mejorará la calidad de vida tanto de su familia, como la de las demás personas que influyen en esta ardua y exigente labor.
texts.en: Around two years ago Berta decided to start her own business in order to help her husband with the household expenses.  She set up a sewing studio in a small space in her home.  She works Monday through Saturday from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm and her oldest daughter helps her.  She learned this business from some friends and thanks to training courses provided by the mayor's office she was able to expand her knowledge and improve her technique, which has made her known in the area and won her contracts with good businesses for whom she makes uniforms.  Her charisma, drive, and dedication have allowed her to get ahead and previous loans have provided her with the support to strengthen her business little by little.  This is why she is asking for her sixth loan; she needs to renovate her workspace (paint and expansion) and perform maintenance on her sewing machines' motors.
